long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Mantra manager, Help you to update birth id from excel,
it is a auto filling form extension  

Caption
1. Mantra manage Filler is not official India government software, app and extension.
2. If you use this extension, then it will be your responsibility that how you are using this extension.
3. The main purpose of these extension is to make Data Entry easy, but if you use this extension to upload data unofficially, then it will be your responsibility. Mantra manager will not have any responsibility in this.
